page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Before school starts we play football, and during morning play we play football in the playground too. Any one can join in but usually none of the girls play. At dinner time we play football or toy scraps in the field. Before when we were not allowed to play in the field we used to play semi or bulldog or toyscraps. Semi you play like this: you have to run from a half of a circle to another and someone tries to get you. If they hit you you are it with them. Bulldog is where you line up all behind a line and someone is it. We have races in the field. One day we had a piggyback race and I won but we got told off and we had to stay in the play ground.Morning and afternoon play last 15 minutes. Dinner time is 1hour 15 minutes long.
